title: Fuck This Person in Particular

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Redirect all killing abilities used tonight onto a target, ignoring redirection immunity. If they are Evil and your "Main target", and die tonight, gain one point to your victory condition.
- Redirect all investigative abilities used tonight onto a target, ignoring redirection immunity. They will also be framed. If they are not evil, are your "main target" and are executed the next day, gain one point to your victory condition
- Redirect all protective abilities used tonight onto a target's target (this ability fails if they don't have a target), ignoring redirection immunity. If they are a killing role, are your "Main target", and either fails a kill two nights in a row (either last night and this night or this night and last night), or they fail a kill this night and dies before next night, gain one point to your victory condition

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - One player is your "Main target" at random. if they die or a cycle passes then your main target changes

fields.name: Defence (cont.):
fields.value: Goal: Gain 3 "points" to your victory condition. Upon achieving this goal you leave town victorious
